'''''"That's What They Call a Getaway!"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to allow a struggling fish to get off the hook while [[Fishing]].

==Trivia==
* The name "That's what they call a getaway!" is a reference to a famous line in the Japanese manga ''{{w|JoJo's Bizarre Adventure}}''.
